summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4097 lux) and cloud levels (up 393 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1329 m), light levels (up 6411 lux), feels like temperature (up 3.4°C), and outside temperature (up 2.9°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1480.1m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Possible light showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
